target_content: Halve the amount of residual (non-recycled) municipal waste
NACE_level1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level2_extra1: C32 - Other manufacturing
NACE_level_3_extra1: E38.2 - Waste treatment and disposal
justification: This target is focused on waste management and recycling, which aligns with the activities in the E38 category. Manufacturing is included due to the potential involvement in recycling processes.

target_content: Union's access to a secure and sustainable supply of critical raw materials by ensuring that the Union's recycling capacity, including for all intermediate recycling steps, is able to produce at least 15% of the Union's annual consumption of strategic raw materials
NACE_level1: B - Mining and Quarrying
NACE_level1_extra2: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: B9 - Mining support service activities
NACE_level2_extra1: C24 - Manufacture of basic metals
NACE_level2_extra2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level_3: B9.9 - Support activities for other mining and quarrying
NACE_level_3_extra1: C24.1 - Manufacture of basic iron and steel and of ferro-alloys
justification: The target involves recycling and raw material supply, which involves mining, manufacturing, and waste management sectors.

target_content: Diversify the Union's imports of strategic raw materials with a view to ensure that the Union's annual consumption of each strategic raw material at any relevant stage of processing can rely on imports from several third countries, none of which provide more than 65% of the Union's annual consumption
NACE_level1: B - Mining and Quarrying
NACE_level1_extra2: G - Wholesale and Retail Trade, Repair of Motor Vehicles and Motorcycles
NACE_level2: B7 - Mining of metal ores
NACE_level2_extra1: C24 - Manufacture of basic metals
NACE_level2_extra2: G46 - Wholesale trade, except of motor vehicles and motorcycles
NACE_level_3_extra1: C24.1 - Manufacture of basic iron and steel and of ferro-alloys
NACE level3_extra2: G46.1 - Wholesale on a fee or contract basis
justification: The target focuses on the diversification of raw materials, involving mining, manufacturing, and trade sectors.

target_content: by 2030, manufacturing capacity in the Union of the strategic net-zero technologies listed in the Annex approaches or reaches a benchmark of at least 40% of the Union’s annual deployment needs for the corresponding technologies necessary to achieve the Union’s 2030 climate and energy targets
NACE_level1: C - Manufacturing
NACE_level1_extra1: D - Electricity, Gas, Steam and Air Conditioning Supply
NACE_level1_extra2: M - Professional, Scientific and Technical Activities

NACE_level_3_extra1: D35.1 - Electric power generation, transmission and distribution
NACE level3_extra2: M72.1 - Research and experimental development on natural sciences and engineering
justification: The target is about increasing manufacturing capacity for net-zero technologies, involving manufacturing, energy supply, and scientific research.

target_content: Producers of portable batteries or, where appointed in accordance with Article 57(1), producer responsibility organisations, shall ensure that all waste portable batteries, Light Means of Transport (LMT) and SLI batteries, regardless of their nature, chemical composition, condition, brand or origin, are collected separately in the territory of a Member State where they make these batteries available on the market for the first time.
NACE_level1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level2_extra1: C27 - Manufacture of electrical equipment
NACE_level_3_extra1: C27.2 - Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
justification: The target involves the collection and recycling of batteries, which relates to waste management and the manufacturing of electrical equipment.

target_content: Producers of portable batteries or producer responsibility organisations, shall attain, and maintain durably, at least the following collection targets for waste portable batteries: 45 % by 31 December 2023, 63 % by 31 December 2027, 73 % by 31 December 2030.
NACE_level1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level2_extra1: C27 - Manufacture of electrical equipment
NACE_level_3_extra1: C27.2 - Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
justification: The target sets collection goals for waste batteries, involving waste management and battery manufacturing.

target_content: Producers of LMT (Light Means of Transport) batteries or producer responsibility organisations, shall attain, and maintain durably, at least the following collection targets of waste LMT batteries: 51 % by 31 December 2028, 61 % by 31 December 2031.
NACE_level1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level2_extra1: C27 - Manufacture of electrical equipment
NACE_level_3_extra1: C27.2 - Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
justification: This target is about collecting LMT batteries, involving waste management and battery manufacturing.

target_content: Recycled content in industrial batteries, electric vehicle batteries, LMT batteries and SLI batteries: Cobalt:  16 % by 2031 (26% by 2036), Lead: 85% (85%), Nickel: 6% (12%), Lithium 6% (15%)
NACE_level1: C - Manufacturing
NACE_level1_extra1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: C27 - Manufacture of electrical equipment
NACE_level2_extra1: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level_3: C27.2 - Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
NACE_level_3_extra1: E38.3 - Materials recovery
justification: The target focuses on increasing recycled content in batteries, involving manufacturing and waste management.

target_content: All batteries incorporated in market products shall be readily removable and replaceable by the end-user at any time during the lifetime (except some derogations)

justification: The target involves the design and trade of batteries, relevant to manufacturing and retail sectors.

target_content: Reduce landfill to a maximum of 10% of municipal waste

target_content: Recycling shall achieve at least the following targets for recycling efficiency: No later than 31 December 2025 - 75% by average weight of lead-acid batteries, - 80% by average weight of nickel-cadmium batteries - 50% by average weight of other waste batteries No later than 31 December 2030 - 80% by average weight of lead-acid batteries,
NACE_level1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level2_extra1: C27 - Manufacture of electrical equipment

target_content: Recycling shall achieve at least the following targets for recycling efficiency: No later than 31 December 2025 - 65% by average weight of lithium-based batteries, No later than 31 December 2030 - 70% by average weight of lithium-based batteries

target_content: All recycling shall achieve at least the following targets for recovery of materials: No later than 31 December 2027 -90% for cobalt, copper, lead and nickel, No later than 31 December 2031: -95% for cobalt, copper, lead, and nickel,

NACE_level_3_extra1: C24.4 - Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

target_content: All recycling shall achieve at least the following targets for recovery of materials: No later than 31 December 2027 -50% lithium No later than 31 December 2031: -80% lithium

NACE_level2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level2_extra1: C27 - Manufacture of electrical equipment
NACE_level_3_extra1: C27.2 - Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
justification: The target focuses on lithium recovery from recycling, involving waste management and battery manufacturing.

target_content: Making all packaging recyclable (see European Parliament resolution of 10 February 2021 on the New Circular Economy Action Plan, the New Circular Economy Action Plan and art. 5 of this Proposal)
NACE_level1: C - Manufacturing
NACE_level1_extra1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: C22 - Manufacture of rubber and plastic products
NACE_level2_extra1: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level_3_extra1: E38.3 - Materials recovery
justification: The target involves making packaging recyclable, relevant to manufacturing of packaging materials and waste management.

target_content: The plastic part in packaging shall contain the following minimum percentage of recycled content recovered from post-consumer plastic waste, per unit of packaging: From 1 January 2030 (i) 30% for contact sensitive packaging made from polyethylene terephthalate (PET) as major component, (ii) 10% for contact sensitive made from plastic materials other than PET, except single use plastic bottles, (iii) 30% for single use plastic beverage bottles, (iv) 35% for other plastic packaging From 1 January 2040 (v) 50% for contact sensitive plastic packaging, except single use plastic beverage bottles, (vi) 65% for single use plastic beverage bottles, (vii) 65% for other plastic packaging
NACE_level1: C - Manufacturing
NACE_level1_extra1: E - Water Supply, Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities
NACE_level2: C22 - Manufacture of rubber and plastic products
NACE_level2_extra1: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
NACE_level_3_extra1: E38.3 - Materials recovery
justification: The target is about increasing recycled content in plastic packaging, involving manufacturing and waste management.

target_content: Member States shall take measures to achieve a sustained reduction in the consumption of lightweight plastic carrier bags on their territory. A sustained reduction is achieved if the annual consumption does not exceed 40 lightweight plastic carrier bags per person, or the equivalent target in weight, by 31 December 2025, and subsequently by 31 December in each year thereafter
NACE_level1: C - Manufacturing
NACE_level1_extra1: G - Wholesale and Retail Trade, Repair of Motor Vehicles and Motorcycles
NACE_level2: C22 - Manufacture of rubber and plastic products
NACE_level2_extra1: G47 - Retail trade, except of motor vehicles and motorcycles
NACE_level_3_extra1: G47.1 - Retail sale in non-specialised stores
justification: The target involves reducing the use of plastic bags, relevant to manufacturing and retail sectors.

target_content: From 2019, the minimum collection rate to be achieved annually shall be 65 % of the average weight of EEE placed on the market in the three preceding years in the Member State concerned, or alternatively 85 % of WEEE generated on the territory of that Member State.

target_content: From 15 August 2018, the recovery targets for the WEEE falling within the following categories of Annex III shall be: - 85% for Category 1 (temperature exchange equipment) or Category 4 (large equipment with any external dimension more than 50 cm) - 80% for Category 2 (e.g., screens and monitors) - 75% for Category 5 (small equipment with no external dimension more than 50 cm) or 6 (Small IT and telecommunication equipment with no external dimension more than 50 cm).

justification: The target sets recovery goals for WEEE, involving waste management and electronics manufacturing.

target_content: From 15 August 2018, the preparation for re-use targets for the WEEE falling within the following categories of Annex III shall be: - 80% for Category 1 or Category 4 - 70% for Category 2 - 55% for Category 5 or Category 6

NACE_level2: E38 - Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities, materials recovery
